Producer: Guillermo del Toro, David S. Goyer, J. Miles Dale
Screenwriter: C. Henry Chaisson, Nick Antosca, Scott Cooper
Production Co: Phantom Four Films, Double Dare You
Synopsis: From the visionary world of acclaimed director Scott Cooper and horror maestro Guillermo del Toro comes ANTLERS. In an isolated Oregon town, a middle-school teacher (Keri Russell) and her sheriff brother (Jesse Plemons) become embroiled with her enigmatic student (Jeremy T. Thomas) whose dark secrets lead to terrifying encounters with a legendary ancestral creature who came before them. Based on the short story The Quiet Boy by Nick Antosca.
Title: Antlers
